amendment.description: To increase the number of Deputy United States Marshals assigned to work in immigration-related matters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3213 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3213 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S12720-12721) To increase the number of Deputy United States Marshals assigned to work in immigration-related matters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3213 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3213 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Domenici.
